definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The bright young man can get ahead quickly in the tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 這位聰明的年輕人在旅遊業界很快獲得成功。

sentences.english: The business world is full of examples of hubris taking over.
sentences.chinese: 企業界到處都是自大狂掌管一切的例子。

sentences.english: Such things are never talked about in businese circles.
sentences.chinese: 商業界的人士從來不談論這種事。

sentences.english: The Lahti orchestra has the most extensive cooperation with the world of business.
sentences.chinese: 拉赫蒂交響樂團與企業界與着最廣泛的合作。

sentences.english: The above firm enjoys the fullest respect and unquestionable confidence in the business world.
sentences.chinese: 上述公司在實業界頗受尊敬，並享有很高的聲譽。

sentences.english: Anti-AIDS vaccine research and development of the industry once again become the focus of attention.
sentences.chinese: 抗艾疫苗研發再次成爲了業界關注的焦點。

sentences.english: With good stability and high output, Huihong Machinery are recognized and favored by the industry.
sentences.chinese: 輝鋐機器穩定性佳，產量高，深受業界的認同與愛戴。

sentences.english: But salmonid species like salmon and trout are rapidly becoming more popular in the industry.
sentences.chinese: 但是，像鮭魚和鱒魚鮭魚物種正在迅速在業界流行。

sentences.english: The peanut industry also condemned the company, portraying it as a rogue operator.
sentences.chinese: 花生工業界也譴責這個公司不道德的欺詐的經營操作。

sentences.english: The first, ABI said, is a result of the industry's migration to smaller process technologies.
sentences.chinese: 首先是業界向更小製程工藝的轉變。

sentences.english: What industry particularly appreciates is research that explores new frontiers of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 工業界特別重視那些探索知識的新前沿的研究。

sentences.english: Description: Established jointly by the Customs and Excise Department and the intellectual property rights industry.
sentences.chinese: 由香港海關與知識產權業界共同發起成立。

sentences.english: It provides industry leading performance in a broad range of scenarios.
sentences.chinese: 它在廣泛的場景中提供了業界領先的性能。

sentences.english: This is the first certification almost everyone gets when first starting in the IT field.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有人初涉IT業界時納的第一份認證都是這個。

sentences.english: Industry must actively seek to employ those without work, to train those who have no skills.
sentences.chinese: 產業界應積極僱用失業者，培訓身無一技之長的人。

sentences.english: The business community in China has also benefited from this long partnership.
sentences.chinese: 中國的企業界也得益於這種長期的合作關係。

definition: dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
